001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.feature;
002
003import com.destroystokyo.paper.MaterialTags;
004import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.DemeterPlugin;
005import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.Feature;
006import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.WorldsConfig;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Numbers;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Validation;
009
010import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
011import org.bukkit.Material;
012import org.bukkit.World;
013import org.bukkit.block.Block;
014import org.bukkit.block.data.BlockData;
015import org.bukkit.event.block.BlockGrowEvent;
016import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
017import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
018import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ConfigSerializable;
019import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.meta.Required;
020import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException;
021import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.TypeSerializer;
022
023import java.lang.reflect.Type;
024import java.util.*;
025import java.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalRandom;
026import java.util.stream.Collectors;
027import java.util.stream.Stream;
028
029public class Fertility extends Feature<Fertility.Config> {
030    public static final String ID = "fertility";
031
032    public static final String FACTOR_BASE = "base";
033    public static final String FACTOR_WORLD_COVERED = "world_covered";
034    public static final String FACTOR_WORLD_UNCOVERED = "world_uncovered";
035    public static final String FACTOR_SEASON = "season";
036    public static final String FACTOR_WORLD_TEMPERATURE = "world_temperature";
037    public static final String FACTOR_WORLD_HUMIDITY = "world_humidity";
038    public static final String FACTOR_CROP_TEMPERATURE = "crop_temperature";
039    public static final String FACTOR_CROP_HUMIDITY = "crop_humidity";
040
041    // Utils
042
043    public record RangedFactor(
044            double min,
045            double optimal,
046            double max,
047            double multMin,
048            double multMax
049    ) {
050        public RangedFactor {
051            Validation.greaterThan("max", max, optimal);
052            Validation.greaterThan("optimal", optimal, min);
053            Validation.greaterThan("multMax", multMax, multMin);
054        }
055
056        public double calculate(double value) {
057            if (value >= optimal)
058                return Numbers.lerp(multMax, multMin, Numbers.clamp01(Math.abs(value - optimal) / (max - optimal)));
059            else
060                return Numbers.lerp(multMax, multMin, Numbers.clamp01(Math.abs(value - optimal) / (optimal - min)));
061        }
062
063        public static final class Serializer implements TypeSerializer<RangedFactor> {
064            @Override
065            public void serialize(Type type, @Nullable RangedFactor obj, ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
066                if (obj == null) node.set(null);
067                else {
068                    ConfigurationNode range = node.appendListNode();
069                    range.appendListNode().set(obj.min);
070                    range.appendListNode().set(obj.optimal);
071                    range.appendListNode().set(obj.max);
072
073                    node.appendListNode().set(obj.multMin);
074                    node.appendListNode().set(obj.multMax);
075                }
076            }
077
078            @Override
079            public RangedFactor deserialize(Type type, ConfigurationNode node) throws SerializationException {
080                var nodes = node.childrenList();
081                List<? extends ConfigurationNode> range;
082                if (nodes.size() != 3 || (range = nodes.get(0).childrenList()).size() != 3)
083                    throw new SerializationException(node, type, "Must be list of [ [ min, optimal, max ], multiplier min, multiplier max ]");
084                try {
085                    return new RangedFactor(
086                            range.get(0).getDouble(),
087                            range.get(1).getDouble(),
088                            range.get(2).getDouble(),
089                            nodes.get(1).getDouble(),
090                            nodes.get(2).getDouble()
091                    );
092                } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
093                    throw new SerializationException(node, type, e);
094                }
095            }
096        }
097    }
098
099    // Config
100
101    @ConfigSerializable
102    public static final class ClimateFactors {
103        public final @Nullable RangedFactor temperature;
104        public final @Nullable RangedFactor humidity;
105
106        private ClimateFactors() {
107            temperature = null;
108            humidity = null;
109        }
110    }
111
112    @ConfigSerializable
113    public static final class Config {
114        transient Fertility feature;
115        public final double baseChance;
116        public final @Required WorldsConfig<WorldConfig> worlds;
117        public final @Required Map<BlockData, ClimateFactors> crops;
118
119        private Config() {
120            baseChance = 1;
121            worlds = new WorldsConfig<>();
122            crops = new HashMap<>();
123        }
124
125        void initialize(Fertility feature) {
126            this.feature = feature;
127        }
128    }
129
130    @ConfigSerializable
131    public static final class Multipliers {
132        public final double chance;
133        public final Map<String, Double> seasons;
134        public final ClimateFactors climate;
135
136        private Multipliers() {
137            chance = 1;
138            seasons = new HashMap<>();
139            climate = new ClimateFactors();
140        }
141    }
142
143    @ConfigSerializable
144    public static final class WorldConfig {
145        public final int safeY;
146        public final int coverHeight;
147        public final Set<BlockData> coverBlocks;
148        public final Multipliers covered;
149        public final Multipliers uncovered;
150
151        private WorldConfig() {
152            safeY = 48;
153            coverHeight = 16;
154            coverBlocks = Stream.of(Material.values())
155                    .filter(MaterialTags.GLASS::isTagged)
156                    .map(Bukkit::createBlockData)
157                    .collect(Collectors.toSet());
158            covered = new Multipliers();
159            uncovered = new Multipliers();
160        }
161    }
162
163    public Fertility(DemeterPlugin plugin) {
164        super(plugin);
165    }
166
167    @Override public String id() { return ID; }
168
169    @Override
170    public void configure(ConfigurationNode config) throws SerializationException {
171        this.config = config.get(Config.class);
172        if (this.config == null)
173            throw new SerializationException("null");
174        this.config.initialize(this);
175    }
176
177    @Override
178    public void enable() {}
179
180    @Override
181    public void disable() {}
182
183    public record FactorEntry(String key, double value) {}
184
185    public List<FactorEntry> growthChanceFactors(Block block) {
186        List<FactorEntry> factors = new ArrayList<>();
187        factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_BASE, config.baseChance));
188
189        World world = block.getWorld();
190        config.worlds.get(world).ifPresent(worldConfig -> {
191            boolean covered = false;
192            int x = block.getX(), y = block.getY(), z = block.getZ();
193            if (y <= worldConfig.safeY && world.getHighestBlockYAt(x, z) > y)
194                covered = true;
195            else {
196                for (int d = 0; d < worldConfig.coverHeight; d++) {
197                    Block above = world.getBlockAt(x, y + 1 + d, z);
198                    for (var match : worldConfig.coverBlocks) {
199                        if (above.getBlockData().matches(match)) {
200                            covered = true;
201                            break;
202                        }
203                    }
204                    if (covered)
205                        break;
206                }
207            }
208
209            Multipliers multipliers = covered ? worldConfig.covered : worldConfig.uncovered;
210            factors.add(new FactorEntry(covered ? FACTOR_WORLD_COVERED : FACTOR_WORLD_UNCOVERED, multipliers.chance));
211            plugin.seasons().standardSeason(world).ifPresent(season -> {
212                Double value = multipliers.seasons.get(season.name());
213                if (value != null)
214                    factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_SEASON, value));
215            });
216
217            Climate.State climate = plugin.climate().state(block);
218            if (multipliers.climate.temperature != null)
219                factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_WORLD_TEMPERATURE, multipliers.climate.temperature.calculate(climate.temperature())));
220            if (multipliers.climate.humidity != null)
221                factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_WORLD_HUMIDITY, multipliers.climate.humidity.calculate(climate.humidity())));
222        });
223
224        Climate.State state = plugin.climate().state(block);
225        BlockData data = block.getBlockData();
226        for (var entry : config.crops.entrySet()) {
227            if (!data.matches(entry.getKey()))
228                continue;
229            var crop = entry.getValue();
230
231            if (crop.temperature != null)
232                factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_CROP_TEMPERATURE, crop.temperature.calculate(state.temperature())));
233            if (crop.humidity != null)
234                factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_CROP_HUMIDITY, crop.humidity.calculate(state.humidity())));
235        }
236
237        return factors;
238    }
239
240    public double growthChance(List<FactorEntry> factors) {
241        double value = 1;
242        for (var factor : factors) {
243            value *= factor.value;
244        }
245        return value;
246    }
247
248    public double growthChance(Block block) {
249        return growthChance(growthChanceFactors(block));
250    }
251
252    @Override
253    public void blockGrow(BlockGrowEvent event) {
254        double growChance = growthChance(event.getBlock());
255        if (ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextDouble() >= growChance)
256            event.setCancelled(true);
257    }
258}
